BBEX3.M.YER.USD.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Yemen / USD 1 = YER ... (middle)
General: An exchange rate of USD 1 = YER 30 applied to payments for the import of wheat and flour until mid-1997.
Source: Calculated on the basis of the buying and selling rates of the Central Bank of Yemen, Sanaa.
Comment on 2007-08: Exchange rate as of 1 September 2007.
